channel.title: ConvLSTM2D on My Favorite
channel.description: Recent content in ConvLSTM2D on My Favorite

item.title: Exploring Spatiotemporal Features for Activity Classifications in Films
item.description: The post introduces several experiments about activity classification based on three main architectures: 3D CNN, ConvLSTM2D, and a pipeline of pre-trained CNN-LSTM.

item.title: Video Classification in Keras using ConvLSTM
item.description: This article will explain the Deep Learning based solution of the Video Classification task in Keras using ConvLSTM layers.
